units metal
atom_style atomic
boundary p p p

# Read one displaced supercell generated by phonopy
read_data supercell-${sc}

# Masses (amu)
mass 1 39.948

pair_style lj/cut 13.0
pair_coeff * * 0.01033 3.405

neighbor 2.0 bin
neigh_modify every 1 delay 0 check yes

dump phonopy all custom 1 force.${sc} id type x y z fx fy fz
dump_modify phonopy format line "%d %d %15.8f %15.8f %15.8f %15.8f %15.8f %15.8f"
run 0
